oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Blue Larry Blue Band
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Blues (Music); Concerts; Metal photoplates; Woodcuts (prints); Concert tours;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (blue and black on white) announcing the Blue Larry Blue Band performing songs from their debut CD "Big Blue World." The poster features metal photoplates of the CD cover and the artist, as well as woodcuts of stars.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mike McIntyre;
